resources.string: Looks like you are using Chrome. Try share the URL to OneKey to get your SiteKey prefilled.
These are the sites/packages you chose to never remember the pairing, click to remove:
These are the remembered pairings from sites/packages to SiteKeys, click to remove:
Are you sure you want to remove the site/package \"%1$s\" from never remember list?
Are you sure you want to remove the pairing from site/package \"%1$s\"?
"Do you want to always prefill \"%3$s\" from \"%2$s\"?" "\n" "\nClick \"%1$s\" to never remember on \"%2$s\"."

"Currently we remembered SiteKey "%3$s" from "%2$s"," "
do you want to delete this pairing?" "
" "
Click "%1$s" to never remember on "%2$s"."

"Currently we remembered SiteKey "%3$s" from "%2$s"," "
do you want to update this pairing to "%4$s"?" "
" "
Click "%1$s" to never remember on "%2$s"."
This device does not support necessary biometric features or is not locked.
You did not setup any biometric security on this device.
The stored key was invalidated because of biometric changes on this device. Please store a new MasterKey.
You do not have a MasterKey stored.
You do not have a MasterKey stored, or biometric process was canceled.
The notification for quick access to OneKey app.
Try to auto load stored MasterKey on app start-up.
"Invalidate the stored MasterKey when new biometric (fingerprint) is" "enrolled on this device." "\nNote that this option does not affect already stored MasterKey."
Try to prefill the sitekey from the package name of the last running app. This is just a best guess, please use with caution.
Only prefill the sitekey when sharing URL to OneKey.
Click here to go to Usage Access System Settings. OneKey needs this permission in order to prefill sitekey from current app.
"ProTip: You can always just share the URL from browser to OneKey to" "get sitekey prefilled from the URL."
When the actual used SiteKey is different from prefilled one, prompt to remember the pairing.
Manage the list of remembered site/package to SiteKey pairings.
Manage the list of sites/packages you chose to never remember the SiteKey.
Copy generated password to clipboard when you click the \"Generate\" button.
"Do not copy generated password to clipboard" "when you click the \"Generate\" button."

"NOTE: Before clearing the clipboard," "this app tries to make sure that the clipboard still has the same content first," "to avoid clearing something else you copied to the clipboard." "But starting from certain version of Android (likely Q)," "when the app is not in foreground, it will be denied clipboard access," "so this check could fail." "When the app is unable to perform this safety check," "it will just clear the clipboard blindly."
ProTip: You don\'t have to keep them sorted.
Show a notification to quickly access OneKey.
"ProTip: If you are on Nougat or newer," "you can add a QuickTile for quick access to OneKey."
This is an Open Source project.
"This software is inspired by and compatible to 123 Password by tension7 at" "https://github.com/tension7/One-Password/."
App icon was originally made by SimpleIcon, used under CC 3.0 BY.
